scripts.cy:report: npx mochawesome-merge ./mochawesome-report/mochawesome*.json  > mochawesome-report/report.json && npx marge mochawesome-report/report.json
scripts.cy:run-tests: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000/usuarios test && npx cypress run --record --key 364703eb-a746-407e-9fe7-337e0d3b07d1
